topic.title: zeronet keeps launching chrome on startup
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: ___0.6.5__
  * Operating system: ____Windows 10 pro Version:1903 OS Build: 18362.239_
  * Web browser: __Chrome Version 76.0.3809.100___
  * Tor status: always
  * Opened port: yes
  * Special configuration: ____

### Step 2: Describe the problem:
zeronet whenever I would run it would open my browser which of course was chrome since tor browser doesn't support being default. I went into the settings and found that the toggle to launch a browser was wisely toggled off. So I tried to toggle it on again in hopes that when it restarts after I toggle it off it will respect that setting. It didn't even start. Aside from this the program often just doesn't start sometimes.
#### Steps to reproduce:

  1. _____
  2. _____
  3. _____

#### Observed Results:

  * What happened? This could be a screenshot, a description, log output (you can send log/debug.log file to hello@zeronet.io if necessary), etc.

#### Expected Results:

  * What did you expect to happen?

1604067447_mirrored_eixan_github.body: The beta version of windows I was using recently updated itself  and zeronet is booting just fine now
